name: HOTHEAD (itch) (itchy_programmer)
description:
This game was made by wheatbale.

Once upon a time, you were almost done with a game for the curdle jam, but then something wrong happened and ALL YOUR DATA WAS LOST! You became so angry and stressed that your head began to steam and then later became LAVA. The only way to cool your insanely hot head is to go to a trail of heat, where at the end is a rocket ship which takes you to pluto's moon, charon, where a HUGE fan is which can coll you down! But this trail of heat is no easy task...

Controlls:

Arrow keys to move.

You can burn some things when you hit the bottom of them (you hit them with you head).

the rest of the instructions are already told in the game.

Have fun!
